title: Image Rotate on Hover
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a hover effect that rotates an image using CSS properties. By using scale(), rotate(), and transition, we can make the image appear to rotate when the user hovers over the parent element. We will also use overflow: hidden to hide the excess from the image transformation, creating a clean and polished effect.

meta.title: Captivating Image Rotation Effect
meta.description: Learn how to create a mesmerizing hover effect that rotates an image using CSS.
meta.keywords: css, web design, css practice, hover effect, css animation, css playground, image rotation, web development, css lab, css exercises
